testcase.classname: Scenario: go through the service to button \"\u041A\u0443\u043F\u0438\u0442\u044C\"
testcase.name: And select countries: \u0428\u0435\u043D\u0433\u0435\u043D\u002C \u0424\u0438\u043D\u043B\u044F\u043D\u0434\u0438\u044F\u002C \u041A\u0438\u0442\u0430\u0439

testcase.classname: Scenario: go through the service to button \"\u041A\u0443\u043F\u0438\u0442\u044C\"
testcase.name: And specify dates of journey\u002C any available dates

testcase.classname: Scenario: go through the service to button \"\u041A\u0443\u043F\u0438\u0442\u044C\"
testcase.name: And specify birthday of tourists: 08.12.1945

testcase.classname: Scenario: go through the service to button \"\u041A\u0443\u043F\u0438\u0442\u044C\"
testcase.name: When press button with text \"\u0420\u0430\u0441\u0441\u0447\u0438\u0442\u0430\u0442\u044C \u043F\u043E\u043B\u0438\u0441\" on \"\u043F\u0435\u0440\u0432\u0430\u044F \u0441\u0442\u0440\u0430\u043D\u0438\u0446\u0430\"

testcase.classname: Scenario: go through the service to button \"\u041A\u0443\u043F\u0438\u0442\u044C\"
testcase.name: And spinner should be displayed

testcase.classname: Scenario: go through the service to button \"\u041A\u0443\u043F\u0438\u0442\u044C\"
testcase.name: And wait until spinner disappears

testcase.classname: Scenario: go through the service to button \"\u041A\u0443\u043F\u0438\u0442\u044C\"
testcase.name: Then collection of \"\u0420\u0435\u0437\u0443\u043B\u044C\u0442\u0430\u0442\u044B \u043F\u043E\u0438\u0441\u043A\u0430\" should not be empty

testcase.classname: Scenario: go through service to yandex pay-page
testcase.name: And type to input with name \"lastName\" text: \"TESTOVIY\" on \"\u0442\u0440\u0435\u0442\u044C\u044F \u0441\u0442\u0440\u0430\u043D\u0438\u0446\u0430\"

testcase.classname: Scenario: go through service to yandex pay-page
testcase.name: And type to input with name \"firstName\" text: \"TEST\" on \"\u0442\u0440\u0435\u0442\u044C\u044F \u0441\u0442\u0440\u0430\u043D\u0438\u0446\u0430\"

testcase.classname: Scenario: go through service to yandex pay-page
testcase.name: And press button with text \"\u041F\u0440\u0438\u043D\u0438\u043C\u0430\u044E\" on \"\u0442\u0440\u0435\u0442\u044C\u044F \u0441\u0442\u0440\u0430\u043D\u0438\u0446\u0430\"

testcase.classname: Scenario: go through service to yandex pay-page
testcase.name: And press element with value \"\u041E\u0444\u043E\u0440\u043C\u0438\u0442\u044C\" and it should be enabled

testcase.classname: Scenario: go through service to yandex pay-page
testcase.name: When press button with text \"\u041E\u043F\u043B\u0430\u0442\u0438\u0442\u044C\" and it should be enabled

testcase.classname: Scenario: go through service to yandex pay-page
testcase.name: Then verify that page with url \"https:\/\/money.yandex.ru\/cashdesk\" is opened
